channel.title: Portal?
channel.description: Ok I'm Adding a sort of bounty hunter to my server, there's only one way to get out of it and that's by going through the portal i made. I made it so you can't teleport above 10 wilderness just for this. ok now heres my question i also have an image, here it is. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2upakig.png[/img] How can i make it so you can't use this portal when in combat?

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try this -

if(objectID == 2465) { toX = 3089; toY = 3493; sM("You Teleport To Home."); } else { if(inCombat = true) { sM("You cannot teleport while in combat."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Nope not even in combat and it still won’t work.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493

Are you in combat?

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Ok, i did that.
NO ERRORS!
But… when i tried the portal on my server you couldn’t use it at all.
It says You cannot teleport while in combat.
How can i make it work?
Thanks BTW

Read full topic

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try this -

if(objectID == 2465) { if(inCombat = true) { sM("You cannot teleport while in combat."); } else { toX = 3089; toY = 3493; sM("You Teleport To Home."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

K Here They Are
client.java:13094: illegal start of expression
if(objectID == 2465) && (!inCombat) {
^
client.java:13094: ‘;’ expected
if(objectID == 2465 && (!inCombat) {
^
client.java:13099: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Ok i’m sorry being annoying
Not sure if this is in the correct packet
Is Packet 132 Case 132?

case 132: int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int face = 0; int face2 = 0; int GateID = 1; if (!validClient || randomed) break; if (!antiHax()) break; if (debug || (playerRights > 1)) { println("serverobjs size " + server.objects.size()); println_debug("atObject: " + objectX + "," + objectY + " objectID: " + objectID); // 147 might be id for // object state changing } int xDiff = Math.abs(absX - objectX); int yDiff = Math.abs(absY - objectY); boolean found = false; resetAction(false); TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; long time2 = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (time2 - globalCooldown[0] <= 50) { sM("Action throttled... please wait longer before acting!"); break; } if (misc.random(100) == 1) { triggerRandom(); break; } if ((xDiff > 5) || (yDiff > 5)) { println("Client hack detected!"); break; } if(objectID == 2465) && (!inCombat) { { toX = 3089; toY = 3493; sM("You Teleport To Home."); } else { sM("You cannot teleport while in combat."); } if (objectID == 7146) { } if (playerLevel[16] < 90) { sM("You need to have 90 agility to past this."); break; } if (objectX == 3021 && objectY == 4842) { toX = 3031; toY = 4843; } } if (objectID == 7147) { if (playerLevel[16] < 10) { sM("You need to have 10 agility to past this."); break; } if (objectX == 3028 && objectY == 4849) { toX = 3038; toY = 4846; } }
I Still Get 3 Compile Errors =/

Read full topic

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

I Added
if(objectID == 2465) && (!inCombat) {
toX = 3089;
toY = 3493;
sM(“You Teleport To Home.”);
} else {
sM(“You cannot teleport while in combat.”);
}

Saved And Compiled, This Is The Error I Got.
client.java:13370: illegal start of expression
if(objectID == 2465) && (!inCombat) {
^
client.java:13370 ‘;’ expected
if(objectID == 2465) && (!inCombat) {
^
client.java:13374: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else {
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic
